## Markdown in R

### A Few Examples with plain text

#### 1. italics **I *can* complete the midterm**

#### 2. strikethrough: I ~~can~~ complete the midterm

#### 3. hiding my code with echo=False:


::: {.cell}
::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "I can complete the midterm"
```
:::
:::


#### 4. showing code:


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
print("I can complete the midterm")
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] "I can complete the midterm"
```
:::
:::




### Logical operators


::: {.cell}

```{.r .cell-code}
x <- 10

y <- 20

x == y
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] FALSE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
x != y
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] TRUE
```
:::

```{.r .cell-code}
y > x
```

::: {.cell-output .cell-output-stdout}
```
[1] TRUE
```
:::
:::



```
